璯字的基本解释

璯
huì
玉饰冠缝。

璯
kuài
古人名用字。

璯字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kuài］
［《廣韻》苦夬切，去夬，溪。］
姓。晋代有璯錢。见《玉篇·玉部》。
[②]［huì］
［《集韻》黄外切，去夳，匣。］
古代冠缝的玉饰。

璯字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【玉字部】　璯； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页743第14
【廣韻】【集韻】?苦夬切，音快。人名。晉有錢璯。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?黃外切，音會。玉飾冠縫。　又【五音集韻】古外切，音儈。義同。

璯字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
璯字的起名意思

玉饰冠缝。古人名用字。

璯
Basic explanation of words
璯
huì
Jade decorated crown seams.
璯
kuài
Ancient names used words.
璯
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［kuài］
["Guang Yun" bitterly cut, go to Chu, Xi. ]
name. There was money in the Jin Dynasty. See "Jade articles·Jade Department".
[②]［huì］
["Ji Yun" Huang cut outside, Qu Qiao, Xia. ]
The jade ornaments of ancient crowns.
璯
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Jade Character Department] 　璯; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 743-14
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Hard cut, fast sound. Person's name. Jin You Qianzhu.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Huang Wai cut, the sound will be. Jade decorated crown seams.　[Pentagram Rhyme] Ancient outer cut, sound. The same meaning.
璯
